actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend section 13 (b) (24) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt certain employment in residential treatment facilities for children from homes having an unfavorable home environment, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Exempts from the overtime requirements of the Fair Labor Standards Act employees of a State-operated residential treatment facility intended to approximate a home environment for children for whom living at home is not feasible.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 13 (b) (24) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt certain employment in residential treatment facilities for children from homes having an unfavorable home environment, and for other purposes.
